name: Faded Memories
description:
Faded Memories is a first-person explorative game where you visit a grandfather figure in a nursing home to learn more about their lives. You explore their memories first-hand as they are narrated to you. It is inspired by the lives of my grandfathers and the experience I had with both of them as they suffered from Alzheimer's.

It was a memorial video game about my grandfathers and their lives.
